V03prmosubu:1_0: praṇamya pūrvaṃ jagati pradhānaṃ duḥkhālayottīrṇam anantapāram* /
V03prmosubu:1_13: nirvṛte mayi yuṣmākam eṣa śāstety abhiṣṭutaḥ // 7 //
V03prmosubu:1_22: buddhānāṃ sukham utpādaḥ sukhā dharmasya dhīṣaṇā
V03prmosubu:1_23: sukhā saṃghasya sāmagrī śramaṇānāṃ tapaḥ sukham* // 9 //
V03prmosubu:1_24: sukhaṃ darśanam āryāṇāṃ saṃvāso 'pi satā sukhaḥ /
V03prmosubu:1_25: adarśanena bālānāṃ nityam eva sukhaṃ bhavet* // 10 //
V03prmosubu:1_26: sukhaṃ dṛṣṭāḥ śīlavantaḥ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭā bahuśrutāḥ /
V03prmosubu:1_28: sukhā nadī sukhaṃ tīrthaṃ sukhaṃ dharmajito jataḥ /
V03prmosubu:1_30: sukho hi vāsaḥ kṛtaniścayānāṃ jitendriyāṇāṃ ca bahuśrutānām* /
V03prmosubu:1_31: śānteṣv araṇyeṣu jarāṃ gatānāṃ vaneṣu nirvāpitayauvanānām* // 13 //
V03prmosubu:2_0: nirgatam āyuṣmanto grīṣmāṇāṃ yāvat tāvad avaśiṣṭam* /
V03prmosubu:2_2: pralaṅghyate śāstuḥ śāsanam [PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee_6] apramādena āuṣmadbhir yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:2_3: apramādādhigatāhi tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhir iti vā apy evaṃbhāgīyāḥ kuśalā dharmā bodhipakṣyāḥ /
V03prmosubu:2_5: anāgatānām āyuṣmantaś chandapariśuddhiṃ cārocayata ārocitāṃ ca pravedayata /
V03prmosubu:3_0: praṇamya śākyasiṃhāya bhūtvā hy asmai kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
V03prmosubu:3_1: prātimokṣaṃ pravakṣyāmi vinayaṃ tac chṛṇotu naḥ // 14 //
V03prmosubu:3_2: śrutvā ca tat karotv atra yathā proktaṃ maharṣiṇā /
V03prmosubu:3_4: yatnād drutaṃ satataṃ yaś ca cittahayaṃ mukhavacaneṣu anusārayati /
V03prmosubu:3_5: prātimokṣakhalīnam api sadṛśaṃ śatakaṇṭakaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ yenātividhyate // 16 //
V03prmosubu:3_6: mahātmanaḥ ye vacanamātreṇa yathābhāgān na nivartante /
V03prmosubu:3_8: yeṣāṃ tu khalīnam idaṃ na vidyate nāpi antaḥkāmaṃ /
V03prmosubu:4_0_0: śṛṇotu bhadantaḥ saṃghaḥ adya saṃghasya poṣadhaḥ cāturdaśikaḥ pāṃcadaśiko vā [PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee_7] sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ
V03prmosubu:4_0_1: kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃghasya poṣadhaṃ kuryāt prātimokṣasūtroddeśam uddeśayed eṣā jñaptiḥ /
V03prmosubu:5_0: poṣadhaṃ vayam āyuṣman kariṣyāmaḥ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam uddeśāmaḥ /
V03prmosubu:5_3: tūṣṇīṃbhāvena ca vayam āyuṣmataḥ pariśuddhān vedayiṣyāmaḥ /
V03prmosubu:5_4: yathāpi pratyekaṃ pṛṣṭasya bhikṣor vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati evam evaṃ evaṃrūpāyāṃ bhikṣuparṣadi yāvat trir apy anuśrāvaṇaṃ bhavati /
V03prmosubu:5_5: yaḥ punar bhikṣur evaṃrūpāyāṃ bhikṣuparṣadi yāvat trir apy anuśrāvyamāne smaran satīm āpattiṃ nāviṣkaroti saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādo 'sya bhavati /
V03prmosubu:5_6: saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādaḥ khalv āyuṣmantaḥ antarāyiko dharma ukto bhagavatā /
V03prmosubu:5_7: tasmāt smaratā bhikṣuṇā āpannena viśuddhāpekṣeṇa satī āpattir āviṣkartavyā /
V03prmosubu:5_8: āviṣkṛtenāsya phāsu bhavati nāviṣkṛtena na bhavati /
V03prmosubu:7_0: dvir api trir api pṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:8_0: atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V03prmosubu:10_0: ime khalu āyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
V03prmosubu:par.1_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣūṇāṃ śikṣāsājīvasamāpannaḥ śikṣām apratyākhyāya śikṣādaurbalyam anāviṣkṛtyābrahmacaryaṃ maithunaṃ dharmaṃ pratisevate antatas tiryagyonigatayāpi sārdhaṃ,
V03prmosubu:par.1_1: ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:par.2_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur grāmagatam araṇyagataṃ vā pareṣāṃ adattaṃ steyasaṃkhyātam ādadīta yadrūpeṇādattādānena rājā vainaṃ gṛhītvā
V03prmosubu:par.2_0_1: rājamātro vā hanyād vā saṃbadhnīyād vā pravāsayed vā evaṃ cainaṃ vadet* -- tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa cauro 'si bālo 'si steno 'sīty
V03prmosubu:par.2_1: ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājayiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:par.3_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur manuṣyaṃ vā manuṣyavigrahaṃ vā svahastena saṃcintya jīvitād vyaparopayet* /
V03prmosubu:par.3_1: śastraṃ vainām ādhārayec chastradhārakaṃ vāsya paryeṣeta maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpayen maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsyānusaṃvarṇayet* /
V03prmosubu:par.3_2_0: evaṃ cainaṃ vadet* -- haṃbho puruṣa kiṃ tava pāpakenāśucinā durjīvitena mṛtaṃ te bho puruṣa jīvitād varam iti cintānumataiś
V03prmosubu:par.3_2_1: cittasaṃkalpair anekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpayen maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsya anusaṃvarṇayet sa ca tena kālaṃ kuryād ayam
V03prmosubu:par.4_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anabhijānann aparijānann asantam asaṃvidyamānam anuttaramanuṣyadharmam alamārya viśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā
V03prmosubu:par.4_0_1: darśanaṃ sparśavihāratāṃ vā pratijānīyād idaṃ jānāmīdaṃ paśyāmīti sa pareṇa samayena samanuyujyamāno vā asamanuyujyamāno
V03prmosubu:par.4_0_2: vā āpanno viśuddhiṃ prakṣyaivaṃ vaded ajānann evāham āyuṣmanto 'vocaṃ jānāmīty apaśyāmīti riktaṃ tucchaṃ mṛṣāvyapalapanam
V03prmosubu:par.4_0_3: anyatrābhimānāt* ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:15_0_0: uddiṣṭā mayāyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā yeṣāṃ bhikṣur anyatamānyatamam āpattim adhyāpatya na labhate bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ
V03prmosubu:15_0_1: saṃvāsaṃ bhogaṃ vā yathāpūrvaṃ ca tathāpaścāt pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:16_0: tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:17_0: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:18_0: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V03prmosubu:20_0: ime khalv āyuṣmantas trayodaśa saṃghāvaśeṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
V03prmosubu:sa.2_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur avalavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ kāyasaṃsargaṃ samāpadyeta hastagrahaṇaṃ vā bāhugrahaṇaṃ vā
V03prmosubu:sa.2_0_1: veṇīgrahaṇaṃ vā anyatamānyatamasya vā aṅgapratyaṅgasaṃsparśanaṃ vā aṅgamarśanaṃ svīkuryāt saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:sa.3_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur avadalavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmaṃ duṣṭhulayā pāpikayā asabhyayā maithunopasaṃhitayā vācā ābhāṣeta yathāpi tāṃ yuvā yuvatiṃ saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:sa.4_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur avadalavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmasya purastād ātmanaḥ kāyaparicaryāyā saṃvarṇayed etad agraṃ mātṛsvasaḥ
V03prmosubu:sa.4_0_1: paricaryāṇāṃ yaduta mādṛśaṃ bhikṣuṃ śīlavantaṃ kalyāṇadharmāṇaṃ brahmacāriṇam anena dharmeṇa paricared yaduta maithunopasaṃhitena
V03prmosubu:sa.5_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃcaritraṃ samāpadyeta striyaṃ vā puruṣamatena puruṣaṃ vā strīmatena jāyātvena vā jāritvena vā antatas tatkṣaṇikāyām api saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:sa.6_0: svayaṃ yācitā bhikṣuṇā kuṭiṃ kārayitvā asvāmikām ātmoddeśikāṃ prāmāṇikā kuṭiḥ kārayitavyā /
V03prmosubu:sa.6_1: tatredaṃ kuṭyāḥ pramāṇaṃ dairghyeṇa dvādaśa vitastayaḥ sugatavitastyā tīryak saptāntarataḥ /
V03prmosubu:sa.6_3: abhinītair bhikṣubhir vāstu draṣṭavyam anārambhaṃ saparikramam* /
V03prmosubu:sa.6_4_0: sārambhe ced bhikṣur vāstuny aparākrame svayaṃ yācitāṃ kuṭiṃ kārayed asvāmikām ātmoddeśakāṃ bhikṣūṃś ca nābhinayed vāstu
V03prmosubu:sa.6_4_1: darśanāya anabhinītair bhikṣubhiḥ adarśitavāstuni pramāṇaṃ vātikramet saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:sa.7_0: mahallakaṃ punar bhikṣuḥ vihāraṃ kārayamānāḥ sasvāmikaṃ saṃghoddeśakaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣavo 'bhihitavyā vāstudarśanāya /
V03prmosubu:sa.7_1: ataḥ abhinītair bhikṣubhir vāstu draṣṭavam anāraṃbhaṃ saparikramam* /
V03prmosubu:sa.7_2: sāraṃbhe ced bhikṣur vāstuny aparikrame mahantaṃ vihāraṃ kārayitvā yat sasvāmikaṃ saṃghoddeśakaṃ bhikṣūṃś ca nābhinayed vāstudarśanāya saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:sa.8_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur dviṣṭoddeśād apratītaḥ śuddhaṃ bhikṣuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dharmeṇānudhvaṃsayed apy evainaṃ brahmacaryāc
V03prmosubu:sa.8_0_1: cyāvayeyam iti tasya ca apareṇa samayena samanuyujyamāno vā asamanuyujyamāno vā amūlakam eva svādhikaraṇaṃ bhaved bhikṣuś
V03prmosubu:sa.8_0_2: ca dveṣe pratiṣṭhed dveṣeṇāvocam iti saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:sa.9_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur dviṣṭoddeśād apratītaḥ śuddhaṃ bhikṣuṃ anyasya vā anyathābhāgīyasya adhikaraṇasya kañcid eva leśamātraṃ
V03prmosubu:sa.9_0_1: dharmam upādāya pārājikena dharmeṇa anudhvaṃsayed apy evainaṃ brahmacaryāc cyāvayeyam iti tasya ca apareṇa samayena samanuyujyamānasya
V03prmosubu:sa.9_0_2: vā samanuyujyamānasya vā anyabhāgīyaṃ tad adhikaraṇaṃ bhavati kaścid eva leśoddeśamātro dharma upātto bhavati bhikṣuś ca
V03prmosubu:sa.9_0_3: dveṣe pratiṣṭhed dveṣād avocam iti saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:sa.10_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākramed bhedakaraṇasaṃvartanīyaṃ cādhikaraṇaṃ samādhāya pragṛhya tiṣṭhet
V03prmosubu:sa.10_0_1: sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ -- mā tvam āyuṣman samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākramed bhedakaraṇasaṃvartanīyaṃ
V03prmosubu:sa.10_1_0: sametv āyuṣman sārdhaṃ saṃghena samagro saṃghasahitaḥ saṃmodamāno 'vivadamānaḥ ekāgradharmoddeśaḥ ekakṣīrodakībhūtaḥ śāstu
V03prmosubu:sa.10_1_1: darśayamānaḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ vihāraṃ tu niśṛja tvam āyuṣman* idam evaṃrūpaṃ saṃghabhedakaraṇaṃ vastu /
V03prmosubu:sa.10_2_0: evaṃ cet sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir ucyamānas tathaiva vastu samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭhet* śuddhas tu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
V03prmosubu:sa.10_2_1: na ca pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyaḥ tasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyujyamānaḥ
V03prmosubu:sa.10_2_2: samanuśiṣyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjet saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:sa.11_0_0: tasya khalu bhikṣor bhikṣavaḥ syur sahāyakāḥ vyagravādinaḥ eko vā dvau vā saṃbahulā vā te tān bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeyuḥ -- mā
V03prmosubu:sa.11_0_1: yūyam āyuṣmantaḥ taṃ bhikṣuṃ kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā kiṃcid vadata tat kasmād dhetor dharmavādī āyuṣmanto bhikṣur vinayavādī
V03prmosubu:sa.11_0_2: ca so 'smākaṃ caiṣaś chandaṃ ca ruciñ cādāya tu vyāharati /
V03prmosubu:sa.11_1: jānaṃś ca sa bhikṣur bhāṣate nājānan yac cāsya bhikṣoḥ rocate ca kṣamate ca asmākam api rocate ca kṣamate ca iti /
V03prmosubu:sa.11_2_0: te bhikṣavo bhikṣubhir evaṃ syur vacanīyā -- māyuṣmanta evaṃ vadantu na ca sa bhikṣur dharmavādī na vinayavādī adharmaṃ caiṣo
V03prmosubu:sa.11_2_1: 'vinayaṃ cāsmākaṃ chandaṃ ruciñ cādāya tu vyāharati nājānaṃś ca sa bhikṣur bhāṣate jānaṃś ca yac cāsya bikṣoḥ rocate ca kṣamate
V03prmosubu:sa.11_2_2: ca tavāyuṣmato 'pi saṃghabhedaḥ na rocate māyuṣmatām api saṃghabhedo rocate sametv āyuṣmantaḥ saṃghena samagro hi saṃgho
V03prmosubu:sa.11_2_3: saṃmodamāno avivadamāno ekāgradharmoddeśaḥ ekakṣīrodakībhūtaḥ śāstu darśayamānaḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharantu /
V03prmosubu:sa.11_3: tiṣṭha mā tvam āyuṣman saṃghabhedāya niḥsṛja imām evaṃrūpāṃ saṃghabhedakarāṃ kathām* /
V03prmosubu:sa.11_4_0: evaṃ te bhikṣavo bhikṣubhiḥ dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyāḥ samanuśāsitavyās tasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir
V03prmosubu:sa.11_4_1: api samanuyoktavyāḥ samanuśāsitavyāḥ pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:sa.12_0: saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ anyatamaṃ grāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upaniḥśritya vihareyus te ca syuḥ kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ teṣāṃ ca kulāni duṣṭāni dṛśyeran vā śrūyeran vā prajñāyeran vā /
V03prmosubu:sa.12_1_0: te bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣubhir evaṃ syur vacanīyāḥ -- āyuṣmantaḥ kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ yuṣmākaṃ kulāni duṣṭāni dṛśyante 'pi
V03prmosubu:sa.12_1_1: śrūyante 'pi prajñāyante 'pi yuṣmākaṃ ca te pāpasamācārā dṛśyante 'pi śrūyante 'pi prajñāyante 'pi prakramadhvaṃ āyuṣmantaḥ
V03prmosubu:sa.12_1_2: yūyaṃ asmād āvāsād alaṃ yuṣmākaṃ iha vāseneti /
V03prmosubu:sa.12_2_0: evaṃ cet te bhikṣavas tān bhikṣūn vadeyuḥ -- chandagāmina āyuṣmantaḥ bhikṣava dveṣagāmino mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca evaṃrūpāyāḥ
V03prmosubu:sa.12_2_1: āpattyāḥ ekatya bhikṣūn pravāsayanty ekatya bhikṣūn na pravāsayantīti /
V03prmosubu:sa.12_3: tatra bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ syur vacanīyāḥ -- mā āyuṣmanta evaṃ vadata /
V03prmosubu:sa.12_4: ekatya bhikṣavaś chandagāmino dveṣagāmino mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca evaṃrūpāyāḥ āpattyāḥ ekatya bhikṣūn pravāsayanty ekatya bhikṣūn na pravāsayantīti /
V03prmosubu:sa.12_5_0: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / neme bhikṣavaś chandagāmino dveṣagāmino mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca āyuṣmanta khalu kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ
V03prmosubu:sa.12_5_1: yuṣmākaṃ kulāni duṣṭāni dṛśyante 'pi śrūyante 'pi pāpakāś ca yuṣmākaṃ samācārā dṛśyante 'pi śrūyante 'pi prajñāyante 'pi /
V03prmosubu:sa.12_6: bhikṣava āyuṣmantaś chandagāmino dveṣagāmino mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca -- niḥsṛjata imām evaṃrūpāṃ kathām* /
V03prmosubu:sa.12_7_0: te bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣubhir evaṃ bhāsitavyāḥ -- evaṃ cet pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ dvir api trir
V03prmosubu:sa.12_7_1: api samanuyoktavyāḥ samanuśāsitavyās tasya pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyāḥ samanuśāsitavyāḥ pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ
V03prmosubu:sa.12_7_2: ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:sa.13_0_0: bhikṣur iha kaścid durvācyasvabhāvo bhavati uddeśyaparyāpannaiḥ śikṣāpadaiḥ sugatasūtraparyāpannaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ sahadharmeṇa
V03prmosubu:sa.13_0_1: sahavinayenocyamāna ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karoti -- mā mām āyuṣmantaḥ yūyaṃ kiṃcid vadata kalyāṇam akalyāṇaṃ vā aham api āyuṣmataḥ
V03prmosubu:sa.13_0_2: na kiṃcid vakṣyāmi kalyāṇam akalyāṇaṃ vā viramantu āyuṣmantaḥ mama vacanād aham api viraṃsyāmi yuṣmākaṃ vacanād iti /
V03prmosubu:sa.13_1_0: sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir evaṃ syād vacanīyo -- āyuṣman uddeśyaparyāpannaiḥ śikṣāpadaiḥ sugatasūtraparyāpannaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ sahadharmeṇa
V03prmosubu:sa.13_1_1: sahavinayenocyamāna ātmānam tvaṃ avacanīyaṃ karoṣi āyuṣman vacanīyam eva ātmānaṃ karotu āyuṣmantam bhikṣavo sahadharmeṇa
V03prmosubu:sa.13_1_2: sahavinayena vadantu āyuṣmān api bhikṣūn sahadharmeṇa sahavinayena vadatu evaṃ saṃbaddhā hi tasya bhagavataḥ tathāgatasya
V03prmosubu:sa.13_1_3: arhato samyaksaṃbuddhasya pariṣad yad idaṃ anyonyavacanīyād anyonyāpattivyutthāpanād iti māyuṣman ātmānaṃ avacanīyaṃ karotu /
V03prmosubu:sa.13_2_0: sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir evaṃ bhāsitavyaḥ -- evaṃ ced tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api
V03prmosubu:sa.13_2_1: trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyas tasya pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyaḥ pratiniḥsṛjed
V03prmosubu:sa.13_2_2: tad vastu ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjet saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:33_1: nava prathamāpattayaś catvāro yāvattṛtīyakā yeṣāṃ bhikṣur anyatamānyatamaṃ dharmam āpanno yāvatkālaṃ jānan pratichādayati tāvatkālaṃ tena akāmataḥ paryuṣitavyam* /
V03prmosubu:33_2: akāmataḥ paryuṣitaparivāsena bhikṣuṇā uttariṣaḍrātraṃ saṃghamānatvaṃ cartavyaṃ bhavati /
V03prmosubu:33_3: cīrṇamānatto bhikṣur āvarhaṇapratibaddhaḥ kṛtānudharmaḥ bhikṣusaṃghasya ārādhitacitto yatra syād viṃśatigaṇo bhikṣusaṃghasya tatra ca so bhikṣur āvarhitavyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:33_4: ekenāpi ced ūno viṃśatigaṇo bhikṣusaṃghas taṃ bhikṣum āvarhet sa ca bhikṣur anāvrīḍas te ca bhikṣavo gārhyāḥ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:34_0: yatrāhaṃ āyuṣmataḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:35_0: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:36_0: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evaitad dhārayāmi /
V03prmosubu:38_0: imau khalu āyuṣmantau dvau aniyatau dharmau anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchataḥ /
V03prmosubu:aniy.1_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdham eka ekikayā rahasi praticchanne āsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayed alaṃ kāmayitum* /
V03prmosubu:aniy.1_1_0: sacec chrāddheyavacanopāsikā trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anyatamānyatamadharmeṇa vadet pārājikena vā saṃghādiśeṣeṇa vā pāyantikena
V03prmosubu:aniy.1_1_1: vā niṣadyāṃ bhikṣuḥ pratijānamānaḥ trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anyatamānyatamena dharmeṇa kārayitavyaḥ pārājikena vā saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa
V03prmosubu:aniy.1_1_2: vā pāyantikena vā yena yena vā punaḥ śrāddheyavacanopāsikā taṃ bhikṣuṃ dharmeṇa vadet tena tena dharmeṇa sa bhikṣuḥ kārayitavyo
V03prmosubu:aniy.2_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdham eka ekikayā rahasi praticchanne āsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayen nālaṃ kāmayitum* /
V03prmosubu:aniy.2_1_0: sacec chrāddheyavacanopāsikā dvayor dharmayoḥ anyatamānyatamadharmeṇa vadet saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa vā pāyantikena vā niṣadyāṃ bhikṣuḥ
V03prmosubu:aniy.2_1_1: pratijānato dvayor dharmayoḥ saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa vā pāyantikena vā yena yena vā punaḥ śrāddheyavacanopāsikā taṃ bhikṣuṃ dharmeṇa
V03prmosubu:aniy.2_1_2: vadet tena tena dharmeṇa sa bhikṣuḥ kārayitavyo 'yam api dharmo 'niyataḥ /
V03prmosubu:41_0: uddiṣṭā me āyuṣmantaḥ dvāv aniyatau dharmau /
V03prmosubu:41_1: tatrāham āyuṣmataḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:42_0: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:43_0: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V03prmosubu:45_0: ime khalu āyuṣmantas triṃśan naisargikāḥ pāyantikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
V03prmosubu:np.1_0: niṣṭhitacīvareṇa bhikṣuṇā uddhṛte kaṭhine daśāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaram avikalpitaṃ dhārayitavyaṃ tataḥ uttari dhārayen naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.2_0: niṣṭhitacīvaro bhikṣuḥ uddhṛtakaṭhine ekarātram api cet trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām anyatamānyatamasya cīvarād bahiḥsīmāṃ vipravased anyatra saṃghasaṃmatyā [Hs.
V03prmosubu:np.3_0: niṣṭhitacīvarasya bhikṣor uddhṛte kaṭhine utpatya akālacīvaram ākāṃkṣinā tena bhikṣuṇā tac cīvaraṃ pratigṛhītavyaṃ pratigṛhya sacet paripūryate kṣipram eva kṛtvā dhārayitavyam* /
V03prmosubu:np.3_1: no cet paripūryate māsaparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tac cīvaram upanikṣiptavyaṃ satyāṃ cīvarapratyāśāyām ūnasya vā paripūrayet tataḥ uttari upanikṣipen naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.4_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikayā bhikṣuṇyā purāṇacīvaraṃ dhāvayed raṃjayed ākoṭayed vā naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.5_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikayā bhikṣuṇyā santikāc cīvaraṃ pratigṛhṇīyād anyatra parivartakān naisargikapātayantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.6_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātigṛhapatiṃ gṛhapatipatnīṃ vopasaṃkramya cīvaraṃ vijñāpayed anyatra samayān naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.6_1: tatrāyaṃ samaya ācchinnacīvaro bhikṣur bhavati naṣṭacīvaro dagdhacīvaro ūḍhacīvaro hṛtacīvaro 'yaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:np.7_0_0: ācchinnacīvareṇa bhikṣuṇā naṣṭacīvareṇa dagdhacīvareṇa ūḍhacīvareṇa hṛtacīvareṇājñātigṛhapatinā gṛhapatipatnīṃ cīvaraṃ vijñāpayitavyaḥ
V03prmosubu:np.7_0_1: taṃ cec chrāddho brāhmaṇo gṛhapatir vātyarthaṃ saṃbahulaiś cīvaraiḥ pravārayed ākāṃkṣatā tena bhikṣuṇā sāntarottaraparamaṃ
V03prmosubu:np.7_0_2: tasmāc cīvaraṃ pratigṛhītavyaṃ tata uttari pratigṛhṇīyān naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.8_0_0: bhikṣuṃ khalūddiśyājñātinā gṛhapatinā gṛhapatipatnyā vā cīvaracetanakāni pratyupasthāpitāni syuḥ ebhir ahaṃ cīvaracetanakair
V03prmosubu:np.8_0_1: evaṃrūpaṃ caivaṃrūpaṃ ca cīvaraṃ cetayitvā evaṃnāmā bhikṣur upasaṃkramiṣyati tam ācchādayiṣyāmi cīvareṇa kāle kalpikeneti /
V03prmosubu:np.8_1_0: tatra caiko bhikṣuḥ pūrvam apravāritaḥ san kaṃcid eva vikalpaṃ pratipadya tam ajñātiṃ gṛhapatiṃ gṛhapatipatnīṃ vopasaṃkramyaivaṃ
V03prmosubu:np.8_1_1: vaded yāni tāni āyuṣmatā mām uddiśya cīvaracetanakāni pratyupasthāpitāni sādhyāyuṣmaṃs te cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpaṃ caivaṃrūpaṃ
V03prmosubu:np.8_1_2: ca cīvaraṃ cetayitvā ācchādaye 'haṃ cīvareṇa kālena kalpikeneti /
V03prmosubu:np.9_2: ebhir āvāṃ pratyekapratyekaiḥ cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpaṃ caivaṃrūpaṃ ca pratyekapratyekaṃ cīvaraṃ cetayitvā evaṃnāmā bhikṣur upasaṃkramiṣyati tam ācchādayiṣyāvaḥ /
V03prmosubu:np.9_4_0: tatra cet sa bhikṣuḥ pūrvam apravāritaḥ san kaṃcid eva vikalpam āpatya tam ajñātigṛhapatiṃ gṛhapatipatnīṃ vopasaṃkramyaivaṃ
V03prmosubu:np.9_4_1: vaded yāni tāny āyuṣmatyātmān uddiśya pratyekapratyekāni cīvaracetanakāni pratyupasthāpitāni /
V03prmosubu:np.9_5_0: sādhyāyuṣmatau tau pratyekapratyekaiś cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpaṃ caivaṃrūpaṃ ca cīvaraṃ cetayitvā ācchādayatām ubhāv api
V03prmosubu:np.9_5_1: bhūtvā ekaikena cīvareṇa kāle kalpikena kalyāṇakāmatām upādāyābhiniṣpanne cīvare naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.10_0_0: bhikṣuṃ khalūddiśya rājñā vā rājamātreṇa vā brāhmaṇena vā gṛhapatinā vā naigamena vā jānapadena vā dhaninā vā śreṣṭhinā vā
V03prmosubu:np.10_0_1: sārthavāhena vā dūtasya haste cīvaracetanakāni anupreṣitāni syuḥ /
V03prmosubu:np.10_1_0: atha sa dūtas tāni cetanakāni ādāya yena sa bhikṣus tenopasaṃkrāmed upasaṃkramya taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vaded yat khalv ārya jānīyāt
V03prmosubu:np.10_1_1: tvām uddiśya rājñā vā rājamātreṇa vā brāhmaṇena vā gṛhapatinā vā naigamena vā jānapadena vā dhaninā vā śreṣṭhinā vā sārthavāhena
V03prmosubu:np.10_1_2: vā cīvaracetanakena vānupreṣitāny āryaṃ pratigṛhṇātv anukampām upādāya /
V03prmosubu:np.10_2: tena bhikṣuṇā sa dūta idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ -- gacchāyuṣman dūta bhikṣūṇāṃ cīvaracetanakāni patyante parigṛhītuṃ /
V03prmosubu:np.10_3: cīvaraṃ tu vayaṃ labdhvā pratigṛhṇīmaḥ kāle kalpikaṃ /
V03prmosubu:np.10_4: sa dūtas taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vaded asti kaścid āryāṇāṃ vaiyyāvṛtyakaro ya āryāṇāṃ vaiyyāvṛtyaṃ pratyanubhavatīti /
V03prmosubu:np.10_5: cīvarārthikena bhikṣuṇā vaiyyāvṛtyakaro vyapadeṣṭavya ārāmiko vā upāsako vā ete dūta bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyyāvṛtyakarā ete bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyyāvṛtyaṃ pratyanubhavantīti /
V03prmosubu:np.10_6: atha sa dūtas tāni cīvaracetanakāny ādāya yena sa vaiyyāvṛtyakaras tenopasaṃkrāmet* /
V03prmosubu:np.10_8_0: khalv āyuṣman vaiyyāvṛtyakara jānīyā ebhis taṃ cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpam caivaṃrūpaṃ ca cīvaraṃ cetayitvā evaṃnāmā bhikṣur
V03prmosubu:np.10_8_1: upasaṃkramiṣyati tam ācchādayethā cīvareṇa kāle kalpiteneti /
V03prmosubu:np.10_9: atha sa dūtas taṃ vaiyyāvṛtyakaraṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca samanuyujya samanuśiṣya yena sa bhikṣus tena saṃkrāmet* /
V03prmosubu:np.10_10: upasaṃkramya taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vaded yo 'sāv āryeṇa vaiyyāvṛtyakaro vyapadiṣṭaḥ samanuśiṣṭaḥ samayena tam upasaṃkrāmethā ācchādayiṣyati sa satvāṃ cīvareṇa kāle kalpiteneti /
V03prmosubu:np.10_11_0: cīvarārthikena bhikṣuṇā vaiyyāvṛtyakara upasaṃkramya dvis triś codayitavyaḥ smārayitavyo 'rthiko 'smy āyuṣman vaiyyāvṛtyakara
V03prmosubu:np.10_12_0: dvis triś codayataḥ smārayataḥ sacet tac cīvaram abhiniṣpadyate ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no ced abhiniṣpadyeta catuṣpaṃcaṣaṭkṛtvaḥ
V03prmosubu:np.10_12_1: paraṃ tūṣṇīm uddeśe sthātavyaṃ catuṣpaṃcaṣaṭkṛtvā paraṃ tūṣṇahīm uddeśe sthitasya sacet tac cīvaram abhiniṣpadyeta ity evaṃ
V03prmosubu:np.10_12_2: kuśalaṃ no ced abhiniṣpadyeta na uttari dhyāyacchec cīvarasyābhinivartaye abhiṣpanne cīvare naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.10_13_0: no ced abhiniṣpadyeta yasyā diśas tāni cīvaracetanakāny ānītāni tatra svayaṃ vā gantavyam āpto vā dūto 'nupreṣitavyaḥ yāni
V03prmosubu:np.10_13_1: tāny āyuṣmadbhir evaṃnāmānaṃ bhikṣum uddiśya cīvaracetanakāny anupreṣitāni na tāni tasya bhikṣoḥ kaṃcid arthaṃ spharanti
V03prmosubu:np.10_13_2: prajānātv āyuṣmantaḥ svam arthaṃ mā vo 'rthaḥ praṇaśyatv ity ayaṃ tatra sāmayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:np.11_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur navaṃ kauśeyasaṃstaraṃ kārayen naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.12_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ śuddhakālakānām eḍakaromnāṃ navaṃ saṃstaraṃ kārayen naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.13_0_0: navaṃ bhikṣuṇā saṃstaraṃ kārayatā dvau bhāgau śuddhakālakānām eḍakaromnām ādātavyau tṛtīyo 'vadātānāṃ caturtho gocarikāṇām
V03prmosubu:np.13_0_1: anādāya ced bhikṣur dvau bhāgau śuddhakālakānām eḍakaromnāṃ tṛtīyo 'vadātānāṃ caturtho gocarikāṇāṃ navaṃ saṃstaraṃ kārayen
V03prmosubu:np.14_0: navaṃ bhikṣuṇā saṃstaraṃ kārayatā akāmaṃ ṣaḍ varṣāṇi kṛtvā dhārayitavyam* /
V03prmosubu:np.14_1: arvāk ced bhikṣuḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ varṣāṇāṃ taṃ purāṇasaṃstaraṃ niḥsṛjya vā aniḥsṛjya vā anyaṃ navaṃ saṃstaraṃ kārayed anyatra saṃghasaṃmatyā [saṃghasaṃvṛtyā] naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.15_0: navaṃ bhikṣuṇā niṣadanaṃ kārayitā purāṇaniṣadanasāmantakāt sugatavitastir ādātavyā navasya durvarṇīkaraṇāya /
V03prmosubu:np.15_1: anādāya ced bhikṣuḥ purāṇaniṣadanasāmantakāt sugatavitastiṃ navasya durvarṇīkaraṇāya navaṃ niṣadanaṃ paribhuṃjīta naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.16_0_0: bhikṣoḥ khalv adhvapratipannasyotpadyerann eḍakaromāṇy ākāṃkṣatā tena bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhītavyāni pratigṛhya yāvat triyojanaparamaṃ
V03prmosubu:np.16_0_1: svayaṃ hartavyāny asati hārake tata uttari pāren naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.17_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikayā bhikṣuṇyā eḍakaromāṇi dhāvayed raṃjayed vivaṭed vivaṭāpayed vā naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.18_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ jātarūparajatam udgṛhṇīyād udgrāhanasatvā naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.19_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur nānāprakāraṃ rūpikavyavahāraṃ samāpadyeta naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.20_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur nānāprakāraṃ krayavikrayaṃ samāpadyeta naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.21_0: daśāhaparamaṃ bhikṣuṇā atirekapātraṃ dhārayitavyaṃ tata uttaraṃ paridhārayen naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.22_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ūnapaṃcabandhanena pātreṇa pāribhogikenānyaṃ navaṃ pātraṃ paryeṣeta /
V03prmosubu:np.22_2: tena bhikṣuṇā tat pātraṃ bhikṣuparṣady upaniḥsṛṣṭavyaḥ yaḥ tasyāṃ bhikṣuparṣadi pātraparyanto bhavati /
V03prmosubu:np.22_3: tat tasya bhikṣor anupradātavyam idaṃ te bhikṣoḥ pātraṃ vādhiṣṭhātavyaṃ na vikārayitavyaṃ sacen mandaṃ mandaṃ paribhoktavyaṃ yāvad bhedanaparyantam upādāya ity ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:np.23_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ svayaṃ yācitena sūtreṇājñātinā tantuvāyena cīvaraṃ vāyeyam iti niṣpanne cīvare naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.24_0_0: bhikṣuṃ khalūddiśyājñātiḥ gṛhapatir vā gṛhapatipatnī vājñātitantuvāyena cīvaraṃ vāyayet tatra cet sa bhikṣuḥ pūrvam apravāritaḥ
V03prmosubu:np.24_0_1: san kaṃcid eva vikalpam āpadya tam ajñātiṃ tantuvāyam upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadet* /
V03prmosubu:np.24_1_0: yat khalv āyuṣmāṃs tantuvāya jānīyā idaṃ cīvaram asmān uddiśya ūyate sādhv āyuṣmaṃs tantuvāya idaṃ cīvaraṃ suvistṛtaṃ ca
V03prmosubu:np.24_1_1: kuru suvilikhitaṃ ca suvitakṣitaṃ ca svākoṭitaṃ cāpy eva vayam āyuṣmate tantuvāyāya kāṃcid eva mātram upasaṃhariṣyāmo yaduta
V03prmosubu:np.24_1_2: piṇḍapātaṃ vā piṇḍapātamātraṃ vā piṇḍapātasaṃbalaṃ vā cīvarasyābhiniṣpattaye abhiniṣpanne cīvare naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.25_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣoś cīvaraṃ datvā tataḥ paścād abhiṣiktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto nātmamanā ācchindyād ācchedayed vā evaṃ cainaṃ vaded ānaya bhikṣo cīvaraṃ na te bhūyo dadāmīti /
V03prmosubu:np.25_1: tena bhikṣuṇā tac cīvaraṃ tac ca śeṣam upaniḥsṛṣṭavyaṃ bhuktasya ca naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.26_0_0: daśāham āgatāyāṃ kārtikyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ bhikṣor utpadyetātyayakacīvaram ākāṃkṣatā tena bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhītavyaṃ pratigṛhya
V03prmosubu:np.26_0_1: yāvac cīvaradānakālasamayād dhārayitavyaṃ tata uttaraṃ dhārayen naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.27_0_0: bhikṣavaḥ khalu saṃbahulāḥ āraṇyakeṣu śayanāsaneṣu na varṣakā bhavanti sāśaṅkasaṃmateṣu nānābhayasaṃmateṣu sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmateṣu
V03prmosubu:np.27_0_1: ākāṃkṣatā āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām anyatamānyatamaṃ cīvaram antargṛhe upanikṣiptavyaṃ syāt khalv āraṇyakasya
V03prmosubu:np.27_0_2: bhikṣos tadrūpapratyayo bahiḥsīmāṃ gantuṃ ṣaḍrātraparamam āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā tasmāc cīvarād bahiḥsīmāṃ vipravastavyaṃ tata
V03prmosubu:np.28_0: māsyaḥ śeṣo grīṣmāṇāṃ bhikṣuṇā varṣāśāṭīcīvaraṃ paryeṣitavyam ardhamāsāvaśiṣṭā kṛtvā dhārayitavyam* /
V03prmosubu:np.28_1: arvāk ced bhikṣuḥ śeṣo grīṣmāṇāṃ varṣāśāṭīcīvaraṃ paryeṣeta ūrdhvam ardhamāsāvaśiṣṭā varṣāḥ kṛtvā dhārayen naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.29_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇatam ātmanaḥ paudgalikaṃ pariṇāmayen naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:np.30_0_0: yāni tāni bhagavatā glānānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ sāṃpreyāṇi pratisevanīyāni bhaiṣajyāny ākhyātāni tadyathā sarpis tailaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ
V03prmosubu:np.30_0_1: tāny ākāṃkṣatā glānena bhikṣuṇā saptāhaparamaṃ svayam adhiṣṭhāya saṃnidhikāraparibhogena paribhoktavyāni tata uttari paribhuṃjīta
V03prmosubu:76_0: uddiṣṭā me āyuṣmantas triṃśan naisargikapāyantikā dharmāḥ /
V03prmosubu:76_1: tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:76_2: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:76_3: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V03prmosubu:78_0: ime khalv āyuṣmantaḥ navatiḥ pāyantikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
V03prmosubu:pay.4_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan samagreṇa saṃghena yathādharmam adhikaraṇam upanikṣiptaṃ punaḥ karmaṇaḥ khoṭayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.5_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmasyottari ṣaṭpaṃcikayā vācā dharmaṃ deśayed anyatra vijñapuruṣāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.6_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannāya pudgalāya padaśo dharmaṃ vācayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.7_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannāya pudgalāya duṣṭhulāpattim ārocayed anyatra saṃghasaṃmatyān [saṃghasaṃvṛtyā] pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.8_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannāya pudgalāyottaraṃmanuṣyadharmam ārocayed bhūtāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.9_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ samanujño bhūtvā tataḥ paścād evaṃ vaded yathā saṃstutikayāyuṣmantaḥ sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇatam ātmanaḥ paudgalikaṃ pariṇāmayantīti pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.10_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśe uddiśyamāne evaṃ vadet kiṃ punar ebhir āyuṣmantaḥ kṣudrānukṣudraiḥ śikṣāpadair
V03prmosubu:pay.10_0_1: anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśair uccāryamānair yāni bhikṣūṇāṃ kaukṛtyāya saṃvartante ālekhāya vilekhāya vileṭhāya vipratisārāyeti
V03prmosubu:pay.14_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sāṃghikaṃ maṃcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā vṛṣiko vā biṃbopadhānacaturaśrakaṃ vā abhyavakāśe upanikṣipyoparikṣipya vā
V03prmosubu:pay.14_0_1: anuddhṛtānuddhṛtya vā tato viprakrāmet santaṃ bhikṣum anavalokyānyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.15_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike vihāre tṛṇasaṃstaraṃ vā parṇasaṃstaraṃ vā saṃstīrya vā saṃstārya vā anuddhṛtyānuddhārya vā tato
V03prmosubu:pay.15_0_1: viprakrāmet santaṃ bhikṣum anavalokyānyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.16_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanā sāṃghikād vihārād bhikṣuṃ niṣkarṣen niṣkārṣāpayed vā anyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.17_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sāṃghike vihāre pūrvopagatānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tataḥ paścād āgatyānupraskandyāsane niṣadyāṃ śayyāṃ vā kalpayed
V03prmosubu:pay.17_0_1: yasya saṃbādho bhaviṣyati sa viprakramiṣyatīti ity eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.18_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sāṃghike vihāre uparivihāyasikṛtāyāṃ kuṭikāyām āhāryapādake maṃce vā pīṭhe vā sahasā balenābhipaded vābhinipadyeta vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.19_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan saprāṇakenodakena tṛṇaṃ vā gomayaṃ vā mṛttikāṃ vā siñcet siñcayed vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.20_0_0: mahāntaṃ bhikṣuṇā vihāraṃ kārayitvā yāvad dvārakośārgalasthānād ālokasaṃjñinā bhūmiparikarmopādāya dvau vā trayo vā chedanaparyāyāḥ
V03prmosubu:pay.20_0_1: saharitāḥ adhiṣṭhātavyāḥ tata uttari adhitiṣṭhet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.21_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur asaṃmataḥ saṃghena bhikṣuṇīr avavadet tadrūpadharmasamanvāgamāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.22_0: saṃmataś cāpi bhikṣur saṃghena yāvat sūryāstagamanakālasamayāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.23_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣum evaṃ vaded āmiṣakiṃcithetor bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīr avadantīti pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.24_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikāyai bhikṣuṇyai cīvaraṃ dadyād anyatra parivartakāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.25_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikāyā bhikṣuṇyāś cīvaraṃ kuryāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.26_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṇīsārtheṇa sārdham adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeta ato grāmāntaram api pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.26_1: tatrāyaṃ samayaḥ sārthagamanīyo mārgo bhavati sāśaṅkasaṃmataḥ sabhayasaṃmataḥ sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmato 'yaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:pay.27_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṇīsārtheṇa sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya ekanāvam abhirohed ūrdhvagāminīṃ vā adhogāminīṃ vānyatra tīryakpārasantaraṇāt pātayantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.28_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmena sārdham eka ekayā rahasi praticchanne āsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.29_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṇyā sārdham eka ekikayā rahasi praticchanne tiṣṭhet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.30_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṇīparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjītānyatra pūrvaṃ gṛhisamāraṃbhāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.31_1: tatrāyaṃ samayo glānasamayaḥ karmasamayaḥ adhvānamārgasamayaḥ cīvaradānakālasamayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:pay.32_0: ekāvasathoṣitena bhikṣuṇā aglānenaikapiṇḍapātaḥ paribhoktavyas tataḥ uttari paribhuṃjīta pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.33_0_0: bhikṣavaḥ khalu saṃbahulāḥ kulāni saṃkrāmeyus tāṃś cec chrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayas tv arthaṃ pravārayeyur maṇḍaiś cāpūpaiś
V03prmosubu:pay.33_0_1: cākāṃkṣibhis tair bhikṣubhir dvau trayo vā pātrapūrāḥ pratigrahītavyāḥ tata uttari pratigṛhṇīyuḥ pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.33_1: dvau trīn vā pātrapūrān pratigṛhya tair bhikṣubhir bahirārāmaṃ gatvā santo bhikṣavaḥ saṃvibhaktavyā ātmanā ca paribhoktavyam ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:pay.34_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhuktavān pravāritaḥ akṛtātiriktaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuñjīta vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.35_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṃ bhuktavantaṃ akṛtātirikte khādanīyabhojanīyenetyarthaṃ pravārayed idam āyuṣman khāda idaṃ
V03prmosubu:pay.35_0_1: bhuṃkṣva ity āsvādanaprekṣī kaścid eṣa bhikṣur āsvādito bhaviṣyati ity etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.36_1: tatrāyaṃ samayaḥ glānasamayaḥ karmasamayo 'dhvānamārgasamayo nāvādhirohaṇaṃ mahāsamājaḥ śramaṇabhaktasamayo 'yaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:pay.37_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur akāle khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuñjīta vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.38_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃnihitaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuñjīta vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.39_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur adattaṃ mukhadvārāhāram āhared anyatrodakadantakāṣṭhāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.40_0_0: yāni tāni bhagavatā bhikṣūṇāṃ praṇītabhojanāny akhyātāni tadyathā kṣīraṃ dadhi navanītaṃ matsyo māṃsaṃ vallūrī yaḥ punar
V03prmosubu:pay.40_0_1: bhikṣuḥ evaṃrūpāṇi praṇītabhojanāni ātmārtham aglānaḥ parakulebhyo vijñāpya khāded bhuñjītā vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.41_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan saprāṇakam udakaṃ paribhuñjīta pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.42_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sabhojane kule anupraskandyāsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.43_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sabhojane kule praticchanne tiṣṭhet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.44_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur acelakāya vā acelikāyai vā parivrājakāya vā svahastaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ dadyāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.45_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur udyuktāṃ senāṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.46_0: syād bhikṣos tadrūpaḥ pratyayaḥ udyuktāṃ senāṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramituṃ dvirātraparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tasyāṃ senāyāṃ vipravastavyaṃ tata uttari vipravaset pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.47_0: dvirātraparamam api ced bhikṣus tasyāṃ senāyāṃ vipravasāṃ udyūṣikāṃ vā gacched dhvajāgraṃ vā balāgraṃ vā senāvyūham anīkadarśanaṃ vā pratyanubhavet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.48_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanā bhikṣoḥ prahāraṃ dadyāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.49_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanā bhikṣoḥ prahāram upadarśayet* antatas talaśaktikam api pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.50_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan bhikṣoḥ duṣṭhulām āpattiṃ praticchādayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.51_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣum evaṃ vaded ehy āyuṣman kulāny upasaṃkramāvas tatra te dāpayiṣyāmi khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ yāvadāptaṃ /
V03prmosubu:pay.51_1_0: sa tasya dāpayitvā praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ yāvadāptaṃ tataḥ paścād evaṃ vaded gaccha tvam āyuṣman na mama tvayā sārdhaṃ
V03prmosubu:pay.51_1_1: sparśo 'pi tu ekākina eva me sparśo bhavati kathāyāṃ vā niṣadyāyāṃ vā ity udyojanaprekṣī kaścid eṣa bhikṣur udyojito bhaviṣyatīty
V03prmosubu:pay.52_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ātmārtham aglāno vitapanaprekṣī jyotiḥ samavadhavyāt samavadhāpayed vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.53_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur dhārmikasaṃghakaraṇīye bhikṣoś chandaṃ datvā paścād abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto nāttamanā kṣepadharmam āpadyeta /
V03prmosubu:pay.53_1: āhara bhikṣoś chandaṃ na te dadāmīti pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.54_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannena pudgalena sārdhaṃ dvirātrād ūrdhvaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.55_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur evaṃ vadet tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā te pratisevyamānā nālam antarāyāyeti /
V03prmosubu:pay.55_1_0: so bhikṣur bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyo mā tvam āyuṣmann evaṃ vocas tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye
V03prmosubu:pay.55_1_1: antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā nālam antarāyāya iti /
V03prmosubu:pay.55_2_0: mā bhagavantam abhyācakṣuḥ na sādhu bhavati bhagavato 'bhyākhyānaṃ na ca punar bhagavān evam āha anekaparyāyeṇa āyuṣmann
V03prmosubu:pay.55_2_1: antarāyikā dharmāḥ santaḥ antarāyikā evoktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā alam antarāyāyeti niḥsṛja tvam āyuṣmann evaṃrūpaṃ
V03prmosubu:pay.55_3_0: so bhikṣur bhikṣubhir ucyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ
V03prmosubu:pay.55_3_1: samanuśāsitavyas tasya pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyujyamānaḥ samanuśiṣyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ
V03prmosubu:pay.56_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānaṃs tathāvādinaṃ pudgalam akṛtānudharmāṇam apratiniḥsṛṣṭe tasmin pāpake dṛṣṭigate ālāpayet saṃlapet
V03prmosubu:pay.56_0_1: tena sārdhaṃ saṃvaset saṃbhuṃjīta sahāgāraśayyām api kalpayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.57_0: śramaṇoddeśaś cāpy evaṃ vadet tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā nālam antarāyāyeti /
V03prmosubu:pay.57_1_0: sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyo mā tvam āyuṣman śramaṇoddeśa evaṃ vocaḥ tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam
V03prmosubu:pay.57_1_1: ājānāmi yathā ye antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā nālam antarāyāyeti /
V03prmosubu:pay.57_2_0: mā bhagavantam abhyācakṣuḥ na sādhu bhavati bhagavato 'bhyākhyānaṃ na ca punar bhagavān evāha anekaparyāyeṇa śramaṇoddeśa
V03prmosubu:pay.57_2_1: antarāyikā dhamāḥ santaḥ antarāyikā evoktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā alam antarāyāyeti /
V03prmosubu:pay.57_4_0: sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir ucyamānas tad vastu cet pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api trir api
V03prmosubu:pay.57_4_1: samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyas tasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyujyamānaḥ samanuśiṣyamānas tad vastu
V03prmosubu:pay.57_4_2: pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjet sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyo 'dyāgreṇāyuṣman śramaṇoddeśa
V03prmosubu:pay.57_4_3: nāsau bhagavāṃs tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śāstā /
V03prmosubu:pay.57_5_0: evaṃrūpasyānyatamānyatmasya brahmacāriṇaḥ pṛṣṭataḥ mā samanubadhāna yāvad apy anye śramaṇoddeśāḥ labhante bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ
V03prmosubu:pay.57_5_1: dvirātraparamaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ sāpi te adyāgreṇa nāsti cara careṇa mohapuruṣa naśyati /
V03prmosubu:pay.57_6: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan tathānāśitaṃ śramaṇoddeśam upasthāpayed vā upalālayed vā tena vā sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.58_0_0: navaṃ khalu bhikṣuṇā cīvaraṃ pratilabhya trayāṇāṃ durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatamānyatamaḥ nīlo vā lohito vā pīto vā durvarṇīkaraṇāya
V03prmosubu:pay.58_0_1: ādātavyo 'nādāya ced bhikṣus trayāṇāṃ durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatamānyatamaṃ durvaṇīkaraṇaṃ nīlaṃ vā lohitaṃ vā pītaṃ vā navaṃ
V03prmosubu:pay.59_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣu ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā svahastena udgṛhṇīyād udgrāhayed vānyatrādhyārāmagatād vādhyāvāsagatād vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.59_1: bhikṣuṇādhyārāmagataṃ vādhyāvāsagataṃ vā ratnaṃ ratnasaṃmataṃ vā udgrahītavyaṃ yasyedaṃ bhaviṣyati so hariṣyati ity evaṃ manasikṛtvā /
V03prmosubu:pay.60_0: bhagavatā deśitam anvardhamāsaṃ snāyād anyatra samayāt tadatikramāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.60_1_0: ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ -- adhyardho māsaḥ śeṣo grīṣmāṇāṃ pūrvo māso varṣāṇāṃ ity ete ardhatṛtīyamāsā uṣṇasamayo 'vaśiṣṭaṃ glānasamayaḥ
V03prmosubu:pay.61_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃcintya tīryagyonigataṃ prāṇinaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.62_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃcintya kaccid asya bhikṣor muhūrtam api tāvad aphāṣaṃ sparśaṃ bhaved etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā bhikṣoḥ kaukṛtyam upasaṃharet pātayantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.65_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.66_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṃ bhīṣayed bhīṣāpayed vāntato hāsyaprekṣyam api pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.67_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣor vā bhikṣuṇyā vā śikṣamāṇāyā vā śrāmaṇerasya vā śrāmaṇerikāyā vā pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā upānahaṃ vā
V03prmosubu:pay.67_0_1: sūcīgharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vānyatamānyatamaṃ vā jīvitapariṣkāram upanidadhyād upanidhāpayet tadrūpapratyayād anyatra pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.68_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣoś cīvaram vikalya tataḥ paścād apratyuddhārya paribhuṃjīta pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.69_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ kupito 'nāttamanā pariśuddhaṃ anāpattikaṃ bhikṣuṃ amūlakena saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa dharmeṇānudhvaṃsayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.70_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur apuruṣayā striyā sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāyādhvamārgaṃ pratipadyetāntato grāmāntaram api pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.71_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ steyasārthena sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāyādhvamārgaṃ pratipadyetāntato grāmāntaram api pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.72_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ūnaviṃśavarṣaṃ pudgalaṃ bhikṣubhāvāyopasaṃpādayeta pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.72_1: sa ca pudgalo 'nupasaṃpannas te ca bhikṣavo garhyā ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:pay.73_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ svahastena pṛthivīṃ khanyāt khānayed vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.74_1: pratyekapravāraṇāyā punaḥ punaḥ pravāraṇāyāḥ kālikapravāraṇāyā nityapravāraṇāyā anyatra ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:pay.75_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣubhir āyuṣmatā tvayā śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti ucyamāna evaṃ vaden nāhaṃ tava bālasya mūḍhasya duṣprajñasya
V03prmosubu:pay.75_0_1: vacanāni śikṣiṣyāmi yāvan nāhaṃ bhikṣūn prakṣyāmi sūtradharān vinayadharān mātṛkadharān iti pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.75_1: sarvajñatākāmena bhikṣuṇā śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ praṣṭavyāḥ sūtradharā vinayadharā mātṛkadharā ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:pay 76_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣūṇāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ bhedagṛhītānāṃ vivādam āpannānāṃ tūṣṇīm upaśrutikas tiṣṭhed yad
V03prmosubu:pay 76_0_1: ete bhikṣavo vakṣyanti tad ahaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīty etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.77_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃghe dharmikāyāṃ viniścayakathāyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ āsanāt tūṣṇīm utthāya prakrāmet santaṃ bhikṣum anavapṛcchyānyatra tadrūpapratyayāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.80_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur akāle grāmaṃ praviśet santaṃ bhikṣum anavapṛcchya anyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.81_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sabhaktaḥ kule nimantritaḥ pūrvabhaktaṃ paścādbhaktaṃ kuleṣu cāritram āpadyeta santaṃ kulaṃ apratisaṃvedito 'nyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.82_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anirgatāyāṃ rajanyām anudgate 'ruṇe anirhṛteṣu ratneṣu ratnasaṃmateṣu vā rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya
V03prmosubu:pay.82_0_1: indrakīlaṃ vā indrakīlasāmantakaṃ vā samatikraned anyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.83_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtre uddiśyamāne evaṃ vaded idānīm ahaṃ jānāmi āyuṣmanto 'yam api kila dharmaḥ
V03prmosubu:pay.83_0_1: sūtragataḥ sūtraparyāyāpannoddeśyam āgacchatīti tatrāyuṣmantaṃ ced bhikṣavo jānīyuḥ niṣaṇṇapūrvaṃ āyuṣmatā dvitrikṛtvaṃ poṣadhe
V03prmosubu:pay.83_0_2: kaḥ punar vādo bhūya iti āyuṣmato ajñānataḥ na muktiḥ yata āpattim āpannaḥ tato yathādharmaṃ kārayitavya uttaraṃ ca kaukṛtyam
V03prmosubu:pay.83_0_3: āropayitavyaṃ -- āyuṣman te alābho 'labdhaḥ durlabdho na sulabdho yat tvaṃ anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddiśyamāne na satkṛtya
V03prmosubu:pay.83_0_4: śṛṇoṣi na gurukaroṣi nārthikaroṣi na manasikaroṣi ekāgracittenāvahitaśrotreṇa na śṛṇoṣi sarvacittasaṃkalpair api na śṛṇoṣi /
V03prmosubu:pay.84_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur asthimayaṃ vā viṣāṇamayaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ kārayet tad bhedanāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.85_0: bhikṣuṇā saṃghasya pīṭhaṃ vā mañcaṃ kārayatā sugatāṣṭāṅgulipramāṇāḥ pādāḥ kārayitavyā anyatra adhastāt* aṭanyās tata uttaraṃ kārayec chedanāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.86_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣus tūlasaṃstṛtaṃ pīṭhaṃ vā mañcaṃ avanahed avanāhayed vā uddalanāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.87_0_0: niṣīdanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārayatā prāmāṇikaṃ kārayitavyaṃ tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ -- dīrghato vitastrī dve sugatavitastyās tīryak sārdhavitastir
V03prmosubu:pay.87_0_1: daśānāñ ca vitastis tata uttaraṃ kārayed bhedanāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.88_0: kaṇḍupraticchādanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārayatā prāmāṇikaṃ kārayitavyaṃ tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ -- dīrghataś catasro vitastayaḥ sugatavitastyas tiryag dve tata uttaraṃ kārayec chedanāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.89_0: varṣāśāṭīcīvaraṃ bhikṣuṇā kārayatā prāmāṇikaṃ kārayitavyaṃ tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ -- dīrghataḥ ṣaṭ vitastayaḥ sugatavitastyas tiryak sārdhe dve tata uttaraṃ kārayec chedanāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.90_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārayed uttaraṃ vā sugatacīvarāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:pay.90_1: tatredaṃ sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ dīrghato nava vitastayaḥ tiryak ṣaḍ vitastayaḥ idaṃ sugatacīvarapramāṇam* /
V03prmosubu:168_0: Pay.Schl. uddiṣṭā mayāyuṣmanto navatiḥ pāyantikā dharmāḥ /
V03prmosubu:168_1: tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ pṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:169_0: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tuṣṇīm evāhaṃ dhārayāmi /
V03prmosubu:171_0: ime khalv āyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pratideśanīyā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
V03prmosubu:pratid.1_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur antagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya carantyā ajñātyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ santikāt sahastaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pratigṛhya khāded vā
V03prmosubu:pratid.1_0_1: bhuñjīta vā tena bhikṣuṇā bahirārāmaṃ gatvā bhikṣor antike pratideśayitavyam garhyam asmy āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ
V03prmosubu:pratid.1_0_2: pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmīti ayam api dharmaḥ pratideśanīyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:pratid.2_0_0: saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ kuleṣu nimantritā bhuṃjīran tatra ced bhikṣuṇī vyapadeśamānā sthitā syād iha bhojanīyaṃ datta odanaṃ
V03prmosubu:pratid.2_0_1: datta sūpaṃ datteti sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣubhir evaṃ syād vacanīyā āgamayasva bhagini muhūrtaṃ yāvad bhikṣavo bhuṃjate /
V03prmosubu:pratid.2_1_0: ekenāpi bhikṣuṇā cet tāṃ bhikṣuṇīm apasārayituṃ na vacanīyaṃ sarvair bhikṣubhiḥ bahirārāmaṃ gatvā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśitavyaṃ
V03prmosubu:pratid.2_1_1: garhyam āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpannā asātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāma iti ayam api dharmaḥ pratideśanīyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:pratid.3_0_0: yāni tāni kulāni śikṣāsaṃvṛtisaṃmatāni yaḥ punar bhikṣus tadrūpeṣu saṃghasya śaikṣeṣu kuleṣu śikṣāsaṃvṛtisaṃmateṣu pūrvam
V03prmosubu:pratid.3_0_1: apravāritasya khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pratigṛhya khāded bhuñjīta vā tena bhikṣuṇā bahirārāmaṃ gatvā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśanīyaṃ
V03prmosubu:pratid.3_0_2: tat sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmīti ayam api dharmaḥ pratideśanīyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:pratid.4_0_0: yāni tāni kāni śayanāsanāni sāśaṃkasaṃmatāni sabhayasaṃmatāni sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmatāni yaḥ punar bhikṣus tadrūpeṣu saṃghasyāraṇyakeṣu
V03prmosubu:pratid.4_0_1: śayaneṣu sāśaṃkasaṃmateṣu sabhayasaṃmateṣu sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmateṣu pūrvam apratisaṃvidyate vane bahirārāmasya khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
V03prmosubu:pratid.4_0_2: khāded bhuṃjīta vā tena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśayitavyaṃ garhyam asmy āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ
V03prmosubu:pratid.4_0_3: taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmīti ayam api dharmaḥ pratideśanīyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:176_1: tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:177_0: dvir api trir api -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:178_0: pariśuddhā āyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V03prmosubu:180_0: ime khalv āyuṣmantaḥ saṃbahulāḥ śaikṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
